(OOC: I have a small question, nothing too important, just out of
curiosity.  What side is Bright Blade on, Predacons or Alliance?)

::Skulletron::

	Skulletron saw the action in the room.  Finally, the intruder.  But, wait!
 If she was on the Alliance's side, then he would feel so bad.  But, death
must occur for somethings to progress further.  Skulletron didn't bother to
go in, he remembered he was gaurding, so he stood up, facing the room
entrance, and aimed his ray gun at the intruder, making sure she didn't
make a quick escape.
